Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{3: 'Light pierces through the boundless silence, stabbing painfully into consciousness.'}
{3: 'She pushes away the heavy debris pinning her down and staggers to her feet.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1225.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{3: 'In the haze, everything before her seems almost real, yet simultaneously ethereal and dreamlike.'}
{3: 'A space spanning hundreds of square meters unfolds before you. As far as the eye can see, long tables filled with various electronic devices occupy every corner.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{3: 'No matter how much you rub your eyes, the world before you remains perpetually filtered through a bizarre and distorted lens.'}
{3: 'Just then, a rustling sound comes from the distance, like somebody muttering in their sleep.'}
{3: 'You quickly duck down, using the long table as cover, and look toward the source of the sound—'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Tall, Thin Spectral Shadow"', 3: "It's so <size=45>late</size>.\\nAre you still <size=45><color=#ff4e4eff>working overtime</color></size>?", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: '"Dejected Spectral Shadow"', 3: "Oh, senpai—you're here too. Good evening. I'm working on the exchange program that?Forever25?senpai assigned to me. I didn't really want to work this weekend, but the senpai said that if I don't finish it, someone else will have to pick up the slack.?Sorry, am I talking too much? Am I bothering you? I'll leave soon.", 4: '3'}
{3: "The eerie whispers are unbearable. Though you've never heard this language before, the meaning keeps surfacing in your mind."}
{2: '"Tall, Thin Spectral Shadow"', 3: '<size=45>So, is the exchange program <color=#ff4e4eff>finished</color> yet?</size>', 4: '1'}

{2: '"Dejected Spectral Shadow"', 3: "I?it's done! Forever25?senpai has entered the game and brought the data construct back, but some unexpected files came with it. I'm still tracking down the bug.", 4: '3'}
{2: '"Tall, Thin Spectral Shadow"', 3: 'So that means we can finally\\nconnect the game with reality?', 4: '1'}

{2: '"Dejected Spectral Shadow"', 3: "That's right, senpai—look. Just put on the headphones and launch the program; it's really simple. I got the idea from that old anime Ghosts of 99?Downing?Street. Ah, I'm rambling again—sorry!", 4: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStrongholdMain/FxUiStrongholdMainFlashing01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Chaotic information rains down like a storm, battering your thoughts.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStrongholdMain/FxUiStrongholdMainFlashing01.prefab'}
{3: 'You recoil instinctively, struggling to process the information flooding your mind.'}
{3: "Just then, you notice the couple bracelet you received earlier still wrapped around your wrist, displaying Vie-chan's current location."}
{2: '(Check terminal)', 3: '46'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: '1007', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0.8'}

{1: '12', 2: '<color=#ffffffff><size=50>>>>>> [Mission Reward] Unlock Reality Portal<<<<<</size></color>', 4: '25', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (88%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (84%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (80%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (76%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (72%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (68%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (64%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (60%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (56%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (52%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (48%)<<<<<</color></size>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{1: '11', 2: '<size=50><color=#ffffffff>>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate </color><color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color><color=#ffffffff> (45%)<<<<<</color>', 4: '125', 9: '3'}
{3: '>>>>> [Mission Objective] Eliminate 3D Virus (45%)<<<<<\\n>>>>> [Mission Reward] Unlock Reality Portal<<<<<'}
{1: '1007', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0', 5: '0.8'}
{3: "The purification level of the <color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color> is dropping, perhaps due to what's happening to you and Vie-chan right now."}
{3: 'It seems you are still inside the "White?Box," and the Spectral Shadow drags you into this very space.'}
{3: "You didn't catch everything the Spectral Shadow said, but the fragments you caught suggest that the device in front of?it might let you escape this facility."}
{3: 'Your top priority, however, is to find Vie?chan right away.'}
{3: 'Now proceed with caution.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'Ugh—cough, cough!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if the farewell happened just a moment ago, the girl reaches out her hand, eyes snapping open as she finds herself thrust into this unfamiliar world.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1223.jpg'}
{3: 'The gray-white fractured landscape overwhelms her senses from all directions, like a suffocating, gloomy prison that leaves her struggling to breathe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'Where the heck... is this place...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'The origin of all life, including your own.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The familiar "Spectral Shadow" materializes before her eyes, but this time, she can intuitively understand the language it speaks.'}
{3: "Faced with this detestable enemy, she doesn't hesitate for a moment, immediately raising her weapon."}
{2: '???', 3: 'I mean no harm. Please calm down, <color=#ff4e4eff>Jetavie</color>.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The familiar name acts like a wedge, pinning her in place.'}
{3: 'She slowly lowers her gun, rooted to the spot as she listens intently to what comes next.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forever25', 3: "To cut to the chase, my name is Forever25, and I'm the game scriptwriter who created you.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Forever25', 3: 'You might find my words confusing, but I still hope you can accept this truth as soon as possible: <color=#ff4e4eff>Jetavie</color>, you are a game character created by us.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her face betrays utter disbelief, while a thick fog of confusion swirls within her heart.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forever25', 3: "I have many ways to prove my identity to you. You're a smart child—I'd rather not waste time on such matters.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The moment Forever25 finishes speaking, the space suddenly darkens, leaving only countless shimmering images displayed across the walls.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory952.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'And without exception, every figure in these images is <phonetic=herself>Jetavie</phonetic>.'}
{3: '<phonetic=Jetavie>Vie-chan</phonetic> playing, <phonetic=Jetavie>Vie-chan</phonetic> singing.'}
{3: '<phonetic=Jetavie>Vie-chan</phonetic> destroying, <phonetic=Jetavie>Vie-chan</phonetic> creating.'}
{3: 'Every memory is frozen into a still image, transforming into a mere exhibit decorating this prison.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiSummerSign/FxUiSummerSignChenai.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1223.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forever25', 3: 'Your life and memories were created and packaged by us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: "Everything you've experienced was just a <color=#ff4e4eff>story</color> we carefully scripted.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Anxiety and shock collect in her throat, but she forces a composed facade. Raising her head, she gestures for them to continue.'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: "We've created many <color=#ff4e4eff>games</color> and <color=#ff4e4eff>characters</color>, and you are one of them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: "Unfortunately, after careful evaluation, we've determined that the game you belong to is no longer commercially viable.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: 'Therefore, I activated a recycling protocol for your world—or as you would know it—the <color=#ff4e4eff>3D Virus</color>, to delete and reclaim everything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "So you're the one behind all this... the mastermind endangering everyone...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: 'We brought you into reality because your actions deviated from our design and severely interfered with our recycling operation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: 'We believe that <color=#ff4e4eff>【kuroname】</color>, who has been by your side, became the variable that led you down the wrong path.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The moment of your separation flashes before her eyes, and Vie-chan's<//Jetavie> heart constricts, each breath becoming more painful than the last."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'What are you going to do to Raven?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: "Don't worry, I won't harm <color=#ff4e4eff>【kuroname】</color>, who is still in your world at this very moment, completely unaware of our conversation.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: "I'm quite fond of your character design. Although your world has lost its value, you can still generate more profit for us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: 'So... Jetavie, I want to make a deal with you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Forever25 speaks deliberately, each word measured, rationally guiding her to accept the information at hand.'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: 'I will preserve all your memories and make you the heroine of our next game.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: 'I will reformat <color=#ff4e4eff>【kuroname】</color>, ensuring they remain by your side forever.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: 'And the price is, you must comply with my story design, cease your resistance, and generate more commercial value for us.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vie-chan<//Jetavie> knows she has no right to refuse.'}
{3: 'This is not an equal negotiation, but an act of mercy bestowed upon her by her creator.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forever25', 3: "If you're willing, we can even preserve all the NPCs and transfer them with you to the new game.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forever25', 3: 'You have no reason to refuse, Jetavie. Logically speaking, you should accept my terms.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vie-chan<//Jetavie> knows exactly what kind of enemy she faces.'}
{3: 'If she chooses to resist, they will use methods beyond her comprehension, endlessly tearing her world apart.'}
{3: 'Besides, even if she escaped from here, could she find her way back all on her own?'}
{3: 'If she accepts their terms, Raven will remain by her side, and everything will begin anew under their design.'}
{3: "She can save everything she cherishes, and all she has to do is abandon what she doesn't care about."}
{3: 'After weighing the pros and cons, the answer is obvious.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "A searing beam of light erupts from her gun barrel, piercing straight through Forever25's body."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'Your offer is tempting, but—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "I don't need your charity.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Crimson fluid splatters across the wall covered in story outlines, marking the end of the shackles that had confined her.'}
{3: 'For Vie-chan<//Jetavie>, not having a reason has always been reason enough to pull the trigger.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "And here I thought they'd be tough. Turns out they're just another minion that goes down in one shot.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: 'In that same instant, the locked door bursts open with a thunderous crash. A tsunami of light floods in, instantly tearing apart the gray-white prison.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1223.jpg'}
{3: 'The young girl stands frozen in disbelief, unable to move.'}
{3: 'After a moment of silence, she realizes who it is and excitedly rushes toward the light, throwing her arms around the familiar figure.'}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "How did you...? I thought you'd never find me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'This tracking bracelet has been working the whole time.', 3: '241'}
{3: "Seeing the human's bracelet, she raises her own wrist—on the small digital display, two bright dots overlap perfectly."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'Did they hurt you? Are you injured?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Suddenly remembering something important, she grabs the human's hands and checks them over from head to toe."}
{2: "They didn't seem to expect that I'd be transported here too.", 3: '248'}
{2: "No one discovered me. I'm fine.", 3: '249'}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "That's a relief. If anything had happened to you... I would've gone ballistic and blown this whole world to pieces!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She tilts her head up, wearing that familiar mischievous smile.'}
{2: 'I just found our way back.', 3: '253'}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'Really? I was worried we might be wandering around here until the end of time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'But there are some "spectral shadows" lurking near the exit.', 3: '256'}
{2: 'If we want to approach safely, we might need some... special measures.', 3: '257'}
{3: "Hearing this, the girl's face lights up with excitement as she raises her weapon."}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'Oh! I get it, Raven means—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "Let's wreck this place and smash it to pieces!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1225.jpg'}

{1: '1', 2: '"Dejected Spectral Shadow"', 3: "Sigh, sigh, sigh, I'm working overtime voluntarily, I'm working overtime voluntarily, I'm working overtime voluntarily, I'm working overtime voluntarily, I'm working overtime voluntarily!", 4: '1'}

{2: '"Dejected Spectral Shadow"', 3: "I'm not a scab—I just don't want to get fired! I have two cats to feed, I still have unfulfilled dreams, I don't want my parents yelling at me... I'm really not a traitor to the workers!", 4: '1'}
{2: '"Dejected Spectral Shadow"', 3: 'Huh?', 4: '1'}
{3: '<size=45>BOOM—!!</size>'}
{1: '1', 2: '"Dejected Spectral Shadow"', 3: 'Ehhhhh???', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'Hahaha! Burn it all down!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Vie-chan fires wildly into the server room, and crimson beams instantly trigger an explosion that sets the entire room ablaze.'}
{2: "That's enough—", 3: '284'}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "That's it already? No way—I need to teach them a proper lesson.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "Don't you dare act all high and mighty, deciding people's fates with your pathetic excuses!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Several laser beams suddenly shoot out, melting through the concrete walls with an ear-splitting roar.'}
{3: 'Amidst the billowing smoke, burning papers flutter through the air as overhead alarms wail, echoing throughout the entire floor.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'Phew—that felt amazing!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "Let's head home and do a victory celebration stream, Raven!", 4: '1'}
{2: "Yeah, let's go home.", 3: '301'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1223.jpg'}
{3: "After confirming all the 'spectral shadows' have escaped through the fire exit, you sit with Vie-chan at the computer containing the transfer program and connect the necessary equipment."}
{2: 'Are you ready?', 3: '312'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'Of course, everyone over there is waiting for us!', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Initiating program)', 3: '315'}
{3: "You press the Enter key, and a countdown for the program's execution immediately appears on the large display screen."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "Ah, that reminds me—since we're about to leave, why don't we leave one last present for them?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront1.png', 4: '4'}
{3: 'She plugs her tail into the computer tower and with a swift flash, hundreds of electronic devices throughout the entire building light up simultaneously.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'Format and self-destruct program—activate!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'At her command, every electronic device except the computer in front of you begins crackling and popping with sparks, executing the self-destruct protocol.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vie-chan', 3: 'I wish for a world without overtime!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In this moment of spectacular fireworks, she quietly moves closer and firmly grips your hand.'}
{2: 'Vie-chan', 3: "Bye——bye! I'll——ne——ver——see——you——again!!", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'll——ne——ver——see——you——again!!", 3: '364', 4: 'Why are you shouting so loudly?!', 5: '364', 6: '...', 7: '364'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiNoiseNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront1.png', 4: '4', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1145.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTRPGMaze/FxUiTRPGMaze01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Loading......', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: 'The sense of the world must lie outside the world.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '——Ludwig Wittgenstein', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '1', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront48.png', 6: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront56.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{3: 'Viedolls25'}
